charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] climbed the mountain
to see the sunset, when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard some lively
voices up ahead.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1101_020:
When [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] went to see where the voices were
coming from, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found Lear and a few others
in the midst of a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_030:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I wasn’t expecting
to see you here.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_0401_050:
Lear asked if I’d join him for some training,
so we’ve been doing that all day.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_0402_070:
Yeah. Lear asked if I’d join him for some training,
so we’ve been doing that all day.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_080:
That said, the young master is doing most of
the battling.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_090:
We’ve been making sure that the Trainers and
Pokémon get proper rest between battles.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_100: The young master sure takes after his parents.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_110: He’s strict on himself, just like his father.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_120:
And the way he takes care of his Pokémon and
royal subjects is just like his mother.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_130:
I know that Lear has changed quite a bit, but I
didn’t know that he’d learned something like that
from his mother.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_140:
If it’s OK with you, would you mind telling me a
little more about what his mother was like?
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_150: Sure. We owe you a great debt.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_160: Honchkrow here really loved the queen as well.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_0401_180: Yep. Because the queen saved his life.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_0402_200: Well, because the queen saved him.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_210:
Back when he was still a Murkrow, he snuck into
the royal treasure room.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_220:
By the time I caught him, he’d scratched up some
of the queen’s precious jewels.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_230:
A lot of people thought he deserved to be
punished for what he did.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_240: But the queen showed mercy and spared him that.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_250:
I think ever since, he’s tried to return her kindness
by keeping an eye on the kingdom and the
royal family.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_0401_270: Yes, but I guess that really should be my job.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_0402_290: Yes, but I guess that really should be my job.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_300:
We’ve had our differences in the past, but we
eventually warmed up to each other.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_310: Now, we’re the best of partners!
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_320:
I see... So Lear’s mother helped to bring you
two together.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_330: But that behavior is a bit unusual.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_340:
In most cases, Honchkrow make their cronies take
care of work like that... But yours is very
proactive and does it by itself.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_350:
I think that shows just how grateful he felt
toward her.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_360:
That’s also why it came as such a shock when the
queen passed away...
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_370:
I know Honchkrow doesn’t understand human
speech, but that day, I think he understood what
happened because I was crying so much.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_380:
So his gratitude was so strong that it overcame his
natural instinct. For the queen’s sake, he protects
the kingdom.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_390: Guess so. The queen also did so much for me, too.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_400:
She’s the one who appointed me to be the young
master’s personal bodyguard.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_410:
Being by the young master’s side and watching
him grow up taught me so much.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_430: I wish she could’ve seen how much he’s grown...
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_460:
The queen is no longer with us...but I try to be
extra vigilant when it comes to the young master.
For her sake.
charaepi_ch0068_01_leader2/2301_1201_470: Honchkrow and I won’t let her down!
